description:
The warmth of a mitten with the dexterity of a glove. Made with shaped leather on the palms and fingers, and waterproof-breathable nylon throughout, these gloves use old-world craftmanship and high-quality materials. The removable liners can be swapped out, so they span a wide range of conditions. Great for ski guides, instructors and seasons that span 100+ days, the entry price may be steep, but these are built for discerning riders who seek a top-of-the-line glove.

  • Made of windproof, waterproof-breathable HESTRA Triton 3-layer nylon
  • Fingers and palms are supple, durable Army goat leather
  • Removable liner is made of soft Bemberg polyester fleece with warm G-loft synthetic insulation
  • Ergonomic design uses precurved fingers for a close fit and a comfortable grip
  • Adjustable Velcro wrist strap
  • Long gauntlets with Snowloock toggles keep snow out of your sleeves
  • Carabiner, eyelet and hanging loop provide attachment options
name: Hestra Army Leather Heli Ski 3-Finger - Unisex
